channel.title: Date & time
channel.description:
So my dad unplugged his computer in the basement and moved it somewhere, and then replugged it in. This caused the date to be 6/2/5343. Unfortunately, I cannot play any online games because of the argument with the date and time. I have tried to change the date and time, however I don't have the administrative password. I have tried the common ones (password, admin, administrator, 'left it blank', etc). I was wondering if anyone had a way I could: A) get the admin password without changing it B) change the date and time without the password
I've Googled the issue and haven't gotten much help, so any ideas would be appreciated.

item.title: Date & time
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

Oh nevermind, you can lock it. My dad will normally never tell his passwords, but he just kinda gave it to me. You can lock this now.

Read full topic

item.title: Date & time
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Restart the computer, and hit F2 or F12 for setup when it asks you to

There should be a date and time setting there

Read full topic
